title: Transfer to Mid-sourcing
fullText:
--- product: campaign title: Transfer to Mid-sourcing description: Learn more about Transfer to Mid-sourcing workflows feature: Workflows --- # Transfer to Mid-sourcing{#transfer-to-mid-sourcing} The workflows detailed below are installed with the **Transfer to Mid-Sourcing** module by default. For more on this module, refer to [Campaign Classic v7 Installation Guide](../../installation/using/mid-sourcing-deployment.md).
Label
 Internal name
 Description
Mid-sourcing (delivery counters)
defaultMidSourcingDlv

This workflow collects count information for deliveries on the mid-sourcing server. Count information includes general delivery indicators such as number of deliveries sent, etc.

Tracking information such as opens are not included.

It is triggered every ten minutes by default.
Mid-sourcing (delivery logs)
defaultMidSourcingLog
This workflow collects delivery logs on the mid-sourcing server. It is triggered every hour by default.
headers: Learn more about Transfer to Mid-sourcing workflows

paragraphs: The workflows detailed below are installed with the Transfer to Mid-Sourcing module by default. For more on this module, refer to Campaign Classic v7 Installation Guide.

TABLE: Label Internal name Description Mid-sourcing (delivery counters) defaultMidSourcingDlv This workflow collects count information for deliveries on the mid-sourcing server. Count information includes general delivery indicators such as number of deliveries sent, etc. Tracking information such as opens are not included. It is triggered every ten minutes by default. Mid-sourcing (delivery logs) defaultMidSourcingLog This workflow collects delivery logs on the mid-sourcing server. It is triggered every hour by default.
